Review.Contenu: Ordered laptop and called customer service to cancel the order within 8 hours and customer service told 15% restocking fees applied while returning bc which is non sense. Even though not received nor opened still they will charge restocking fees for 15%.I would advise and recommend no one should buy any item from them. Customer service is rude and attitude.Order number is order # 62550365

Review.Titre: I wanted to order online and I asked…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to order online and I asked about tax exemptions, apparently you dont ship to PO BOXs according to your service line dragon lady that was very biased due to my nationality. while she started questioning me and saying "I feel like judge Judy" while she didnt want me to process the purchase cause it was not going to work for me. I dont see how this is not specified on your website's terms, & conditions, or legal notices section.  Also dont claim global procurement I have been ordering supplies from the US for years and this woman gave me the worst experience ever.

This was my first order from Connection. I am retired and have all my mail go to a PO Box for security reasons. I also do not have a land line telephone, having quit using it years ago and currently only use a cell phone. Those items disqualified me from being able to complete this initial order. They said any subsequent orders would be able to be sent to my PO Box, but since I couldn't verify my address over a land line at my physical address they could not send the initial order to me. Frustrating.

Review.Titre: lied to me, also did not ship the laptop
Review.Contenu: Did not ship me the laptop. Wasted a lot of my time while I was waiting for the order, while nothing wrong was indicated when I placed the order. Supposedly because billing address didn't match shipping address, which is ridiculous as I do not live at my shipping address and a lot of people do not, this is normal. What's really creepy is when I called to ask why laptop never shipped I was conneted to lying, fraudulent employee, who lied to my face, he claimed that they called my phone number and someone there said they never ordered a laptop - it was a blatant lie, as the only person using my phone number is myself, they claimed they called landline for my phone, which it does NOT have. Filing with consumer affairs protection authorities. Bought 2 laptops from 2 large, well-known businesses instead at the same kind of price, received them promptly and without any issues, stay away from this horrendous dishonest company.

Review.Titre: The company cancelled my order without…
Review.Contenu: The company cancelled my order without even notifying me. After 3 days of ordering a MacBook and receiving confirmation and a charge on my credit card, I did not receive any tracking number. The previous order number showed in progress in my account, but after two days they deleted the order in my account.  My card is still showing a pending charge. This company is UNRELIABLE and I would never consider ordering again from them.Update order number: #62012497I contacted their customer support through email, no responses after another 3 days.

Connection.com cancelled my order 61898660 without even notifying me. After 2 days of ordering a laptop and receiving confirmation and a charge on my credit card, I did not receive a tracking number. I decided to call this company and spoke to one of the CSRs and was told that the order has been cancelled. Christmas is approaching soon so I have no time to waste to search another gift for my son. This company is UNRELIABLE and I would never consider ordering again from them. It's run as though they are still starting out selling online from 20 years ago.Updated 12/16/22. One can see the response from Connection is simply fictitious asking for an order # to look so they can look into. The ORDER # WAS MENTIONED IN THE REVIEW! Connection also made the order disappear from my account. The action of this company is similar to those fly-by-night companies.

Seems sketchy. Asked for my student and work emails to verify my name, even though the credit card transaction was successful. So I emailed them from both my school .edu address and my work address. Then they said neither one was enough, but didn't explain how, and stated I would be required to use a wire transfer at my own expense! I offered to take a photo with myself and the credit card, or I could even take a photo of my mail, but they never responded. I haven't had this issue with CDW, so I guess I will have to go with them. You can see other reviews complaining about this, and they reply to claim this is for "security" despite the fact that we have all made similar purchases or larger at other places and never had this issue. Edit: It's been several weeks, so not sure what their internal review showed (if they even actually had one), but I never heard anything.

Review.Titre: Order a Laptop they took the money out…
Review.Contenu: Order a Laptop they took the money out and 2 days later they notified me that they don’t have them in stock …why would you allowed to place an order on something when you don’t have in stock …very unprofessional and poor business ..I won’t deal with them again …Stay away !!!Here is the order Order # 62101559

Review.Titre: Ordered an iPad on Black Friday
Review.Contenu: Ordered an iPad on Black Friday. Contacted customer service after 10 days and was told my order was cancelled because they were out of stock. Why did I have to contact them about this myself and why was I able to make the purchase if they were out of stock. Order number was 61868970

Review.Titre: DO NOT BUY from this company!
Review.Contenu: Very poor customer service.  I purchased 6 ergotron systems.  I installed one and found out that it was defective.  The part is not steady when my staff is working on it.  I called Connection to return the product.  They sent me an RMA and I returned the 5 unopened products.  After I had already made the return they emailed me that there is a 15% restocking fee.  This is ridiculous for a faulty product that was unopened.  I left a message with the manager over 1 week ago and have yet to hear back.  I'm very disappointed in this company that states they have great customer service.  Order #61700686

Review.Titre: I called many times to reconfirm that…
Review.Contenu: I called many times to reconfirm that it’s legitimate order and the credit card as instructed in the email but when I call CSR for status of my order, they asked me to call credit department for verification. It became a loop and order is still pending. Not a good experience

Review.Titre: Do not solicit me for feedback
Review.Contenu: Nothing went wrong, but do not clutter my inbox with solicitations for feedback. Thanks.

Review.Titre: My order was sent to the wrong address
Review.Contenu: My order was sent to the wrong address. And nobody could help me with the wrong shipping address the your company used!Very disappointed in the lack of customer service!!!!

Review.Titre: I ordered a High dollar item and was…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a High dollar item and was emailed a confirmation. The email states to call or EMAIL if you need to cancel, and I did cancel. The next day I did it again to cancel. Once it was shipped, I got a reply about my request 48 hours later, and only after it was delivered did I get an RMA.What is the point of saying to email us to cancel this order if you need to cancel? I will not use EVER again.Rec reply Sometimes, our automated shipping process ships faster than our customer service can get replies, which enables us to have such a fast shipping time..Maybe not leaving an email as a way to cancel? Instead, just a Phone number to call only if this is the case????
I canceled my order via an email reply from their order confirmation email. I guess they didn't see it and processed my order anyway. They didn't follow my directions for the one star.

Review.Titre: The item I ordered was listed as in stock.
Review.Contenu: The item I ordered was listed as in stock when I ordered it. It stated that it should normally ship within a few days. I waited a week and spoke with customer service who informed me it was on back order. I then received a email it should be here the "beginning of May" .Needless to say I will not be dealing with this company again.
Ordered on Tuesday 6/13/23 with 2-Day delivery. Received an email on 6/15 that it wouldn't be arriving until 6/16.

Review.Titre: I just want to buy the computer screen…
Review.Contenu: I just want to buy the computer screen my son wants. Why is it so difficult, this is the second time there is an issue with my card. I have to call from a landline phone, who has a landline phone anymore? This is ridiculous.

Review.Titre: Cancelled my order without notification but still charged me.
Review.Contenu: My order was completed. I received my receipt and was charged, but my order was then cancelled. I was never notified. The charge remains on my card.

Connection cancelled my order and deleted my order number on my account because it was listed as a pricing error. They don't notify customers when they cancel an order, and not honor prices listed on their website.

Review.Titre: Because of email you didn't want to…
Review.Contenu: Because of email you didn't want to sell me a toner, the rating I can give is the worst possible.  You will lose a customer.

Review.Titre: I can not get a response from consumer…
Review.Contenu: I can not get a response from consumer service. i need my order over night and cant get an answer
I emailed 5 days ago to return the item and they still refuse to give me the steps to do so. Poor customer service
Ordered reconditioned Ipad. Should have been shipped. Have not heard of anything for days???

Review.Titre: I emailed support to cancel the…
Review.Contenu: I emailed support to cancel the shipment and they never did

Review.Titre: You spammed me with a questionnaire on…
Review.Contenu: You spammed me with a questionnaire on how you did, before you even did anything.Think.

Review.Titre: Not good said my email was not…
Review.Contenu: Not good said my email was not right..took $ of card..then said it wasnt..call the number noanswer..call again..sayd enter ext..but there is no ext..

Review.Titre: Order never came. Every time I checked it just said received and waiting to be sent
Review.Contenu: I ordered my son a pair of Beats September 16th and it never came

Terrible! They send me the wrong part and I call to return it and just to get a hold of someone was a chore in itself. Then once I finally get through to someone, she tells me I have to 1. Pay for shipping back to the company and 2. Pay a 15% restocking fee! The part was 20 bucks so If I chose to use their scenario, it would have yielded a rerun of 8 dollars and the time spent going to the post office and sending it odd. I threw it in the garbage and will never use this terrible company again.

This cover ,in the picture ,much resembles the removable bordered cover that used to be included with Otter BoxJust a thin glue on plastic sheet for $15.00I believe you can get a 2 pack of these on Amazon for $5.00Another sign of the crazy times we live inVery deceptive and frustratingNot worth the money and not worth the time and effort to return

Date Shipped: 3/24/2022Carrier:UPS - GROUNDTracking Number:1Z61057X0346036832I ordered this a week ago and according to UPS it is still not turned over to them. You got paid last week. So where and when will I see this item? Bob Ratz715 262 7289

Review.Titre: My order was cancelled for a dumb reason
Review.Contenu: My order was cancelled "due to restrictions by the manufacturer".

Review.Titre: My order still hasn’t shipped even…
Review.Contenu: My order still hasn’t shipped even thought I’m been charged. When I call an ask for a status, I’m told the warehouse will need to communicate that. It’s been 4 days, for an in stock item that I needed overnighted.

Review.Titre: I only received one when I ordered…
Review.Contenu: I only received one when I ordered three and the one was dirty

Review.Titre: The Item was wrongly advertised and i…
Review.Contenu: The Item was wrongly advertised and i was shipped the wrong item and no refund. After i placed order for the right item which was delayed for one week and later was cancel because they could not ship it out.Bad experience.

Review.Titre: I received an email in 2/3 that you…
Review.Contenu: I received an email in 2/3 that you needed to verify the shipping address.  I did not see the email until 2/11. My order was cancelled. but I did not receive an email that my order was cancelled.

Review.Titre: I was on the phone for 30 mins after…
Review.Contenu: I was waiting on the phone for 30 mins after that I got a recorded message that someone will call you back ASAP this is not right I will never do any business with them again. Phil

Review.Titre: Called and C/service sounded like they…
Review.Contenu: Called and C/service sounded like they could care less. We may ship it today, and you will get it when you get.   I will see if I can find the items I ordered somewhere else.

Review.Titre: Why do I have to call to compleat my…
Review.Contenu: Why do I have to call to compleat my order this is a bad company . It’s not like they are giving you a big break at the same price for a iPad as everyone else????

Review.Titre: Don't trust this company or what you see on their site!
Review.Contenu: Don't trust this company or what you see on their website!!  I saw a computer on their website and due to the price, I called the 800 number to verify the information. The representative verified that the information was correct, the computer was in stock, and the price listed was correct.  I purchased the computers and almost a week later they are " out of stock"!  I got no notification and the funds were still holding on my credit card.  I called and it took 3 transfers, 1 hour of holding , and getting the information for the supervisor and VP of Sales, Thomas Dion before someone would help me with finding out what happened with my order.  finally  I got "sorry, it was our error, website was incorrect, employee was wrong and there's nothing we can do". The supervisor had no empathy for my situation and no resolve or other options to rectify the situation.  I was completely disappointed.

Review.Titre: you will not get your product for sure
Review.Contenu: they accepted my order and 3-day later they canceled even if I can see that the item is in stock. very poor company. beware it is fraud company

Review.Titre: I have not received the settup file yet
Paid for overnight shipment one week…
Review.Contenu: Paid for overnight shipment one week ago and still do not have order. Never order from Connection if you need the product

Review.Titre: Only one usb c port worked and my…
Review.Contenu: Only one usb c port worked and my lenovo charger fit but would not charge

Review.Titre: I haven't received a tracking number or…
Review.Contenu: I haven't received a tracking number or confirmation of my purchase.

Review.Titre: I Just place order & just notice there…
Review.Contenu: I Just place order & just notice there is no instant delivery.
Bad customer service, don’t buy anything from them.

Review.Titre: I did not get the price quoted per our…
Review.Contenu: I did not get the price quoted per our contract

Review.Titre: I do not know what you sold me?
What I got was not what was ordered
Review.Contenu: What I got was not what I wanted. The problem was handled quickly. I would recommend this site. Thanks for your help with this.

Review.Titre: Cancelled my order for clearly marked in stock item
Review.Contenu: Connection cancelled my order without notifying me.  I placed an order for an internal hard drive which was listed as in stock and with a clearly marked price on their website.  Several days later I noticed my credit card had not been charged.  I emailed Connection for an explanation.  They said my order had been cancelled because the item was mis-priced on their website.  They should at least notify customers when they cancel an order.  They should honor prices listed on their website.  I don't trust them.

Review.Titre: Price goes up by the minute !!!
Review.Contenu: First time using this company and probably the last.  Prices here change daily.  If you buy in quantity,  they will ship part of your order and put the rest on backorder.  That's usually a company's way of hoping that you will cancel the balance of your order. I am still waiting on the balance of my order at this writing.  Within hours of me placing my order,  I noticed that on-line,  the prices began to increase on the same product.  Business practices to me are suspicious.  I  gave it 2 stars, because they did call me to see if it was a legit order. I had placed a quantity of flash drives and they called me to see if I indeed placed the order.  The high point in the sale for sure.

Review.Titre: The order went fine, when are they coming?
Review.Contenu: The order went fine, but I have not received any tracking information, when are these parts going to be here???
Pricing error. Seller was not able to fulfill order or to renegotiate.

Your website is terrible, like shockingly mind blowingly terrible. Run the site through a performance service, some things take 30 seconds to load. Filtering options are insane, for real who decided to set filters like that? Who uses those filters? For real the metrics probably say that 90% of those filters go unused.

ATR Americas Inc., an European aircraft manufacturer, a subsidiary of Airbus, has set up an account with Connection to purchase IT stuff locally in Florida.The first order we done was ok.Nevertheless, when ATR Americas asked help from dedicated account manager to assist in finding other references, he just said that such references were not carried by Connection.It looks like no equivalent items were not submitted to ATR Americas Inc.this leading to put a doubt on future larger orders.Thank you for your future proactivity.Best regards.Frédéric TCHITCHEKATR Reference Training Centre Support Supervisor
I ordered a 10in cable but recieved a 6in cable. Came very fast though.

Purchased an item from Connection.com during Massachusetts' sales tax holiday. During checkout and in the e-mail confirmation, it showed (correctly) that no sales tax was collected and the original pending charge was for the amount without tax. However, when the charge posted to my credit card, they had tacked on the sales tax with no other notification, and they updated the online order details with the added sales tax. I e-mailed customer care with information including the Massachusetts sales tax holiday FAQ showing that sales tax for my purchase was not due, but there has been no response after several days. If there is still no response soon, I will need to file a credit card dispute to get the sales tax refunded, which is a hassle on what should be a simple purchase.Update: I received a quick resolution shortly after this review.

Seems to work okay. Ordering worked fine. My item was backordered, so I've not yet received it. In the meanwhile, I tried to create an account after ordering, and am still waiting for them to connect my order to my account.

Review.Titre: Sales left me on hold for an hour and a half
Review.Contenu: Left me on sales hold for an hour and a half ended up hanging up and ordering online. Product came early and works great.
You should have coupons or some kind of discounts for purchases at my level!

Review.Titre: Your web portal is slow and clunky
Review.Contenu: Your web portal is slow and clunky.  It isn't very user friendly.  My new account representative is too new to be on my account to understand and enterprise environment.

Hello,Very good and smart services with our account manager.Our request was urgent, and we experienced a answer delay with Connection to our need, as our account manager was on vacation and not replaced during that time.

Review.Titre: Good Overall, Filtering could be better
Review.Contenu: Overall decent experience. However, it wasn't always clear what exactly I was filtering on, and it was a bit of a pain to filter on multiple criteria for the same category. For example, I seeing all laptops with 8 or more GBs of RAM requires you to make 3 separate selections and reload the page after each.Also, it might be interesting to capture and track users job titles/functions and then utilize that info to suggest hardware/packages of hardware to future users based on their title/function. Not sure feasibility on that, but would be cool if you could figure it out.

Review.Titre: Order hold and fraud review is excessive
Review.Contenu: Order hold and fraud review is excessive.  I know you need to mitigate losses and risks, but your policies are not documented and contrary to what your order form actually allows.  Manual changes to order information, like changing shipping address, also may cause more problems than they solve.

So far, so good...Shipping was fast.Products delivered as ordered, except the additional warranty items. Those could not be included in the order as they did not have the information needed until after the computers were delivered. The additional warranties were simply deleted from the order. Would have been nice to receive communication regarding the warranty items that could not be included in the original order. Customer service was good in helping after I contacted them about the warranties.

Review.Titre: Real review will be written After I…
Review.Contenu: Real review will be written After I receive product. Only say that due to I purchased UAG phone cover Monday and after they drafted my bank account and contact me today to inform me its OUTTA STOCK. Really. And have yet to see my refund. Hopefully you folks much better in this business.   Thank you & please send tracking product.

Opening an account and ordering items was quick and easy.  Free shipping on my order was a plus.  So now waiting to receive the merchandise, will finish this review after i receive the materials i ordered.

Review.Titre: Quick response from your end for our…
Review.Contenu: Quick response from your end for our requirements. Even though I am yet to use your product, i appreciate your efforts to meet our requirements

Review.Titre: It is very difficult and time consuming…
Review.Contenu: It is very difficult and time consuming to request returns and warranties

Review.Titre: Did not have HDMI output nor an adaptor
Review.Contenu: Did not have HDMI output - ordered Display Port adaptor which works fine and allows me to use.
I would have given 5 stars, but you didn't give me the opportunity to use my PayPal Account as I did the last time I purchase from ABBYY.

Review.Titre: I found the website a bit overwhelming…
Review.Contenu: I found the website a bit overwhelming and could not find exactly what I wanted but found most of what I needed.
Not 5 stars due to website search function. Descriptive search does not hit on correct items.

Review.Titre: They were very prompt and the shipment…
Review.Contenu: They were very prompt and the shipment was received quickly and in good condition.
Received exactly what was stated dimensions and power capacity. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Just the item that I required.
Review.Contenu: Just the item that I required.Used to switch between two HDMI devices for my TV. Works well & has remote.
Shipping was good and I hope to enjoy this flash drive

Before I placed my order, I went back to the search feature to make sure I had the right product and see what it looked like. I entered several key words several times, but the words never pulled up the item, a cube Tripp Lite power outlet. I think you need better/more search line Tripp Lite Cube.

Review.Titre: I ordered wrong fan for computer
Review.Contenu: I ordered wrong fan for computer.  Called and with 15% restock fee decided to send back.  The service rep took information and I’m now waiting to hear about the correct fan to be ordered, hopefully.
We had a one day ice storm that hit the day my iPad was to be delivered.  But four days went by before I received it. But I still got charged for the ice-day delivery.  Bad form!

Review.Titre: Quick delivery and was in stock
Review.Contenu: Quick delivery and was in stock!  Exactly the SD card holder I was looking for, and at a very good price! Have been dealing with these folks for years now.
Very easy to order the items I needed.
Shipping is a little expensive. Good product selection and availability.

Review.Titre: I like the measures they take when…
Review.Contenu: I like the measures they take when purchasing an item
Selections and availability is Good at Connection.

Grant Legg and Anthony McHugh have always gone out of their way to ensure my nonprofit organization is taken care of and find the best value for any service or product we need. We would likely still be purchasing laptops from Walmart if the sales team at Connection hadn't helped us find the right laptop at the right price point for a large (for my org) refresh.
Easy to order online system, and the equipment came a day early

So grateful for there honesty and quick responses. They always go the extra to make sure we get the correct product the first time and in critical situations that we need parts next day they are always willing to work us to make that happen.

Review.Titre: I need to check the machines and docks
Review.Contenu: I need to check the machines and docks.  I hope the operating systems are updated and the docks have the latest firmware. Thank you!The ordering process was simple and straightforward. Thank you!
Never have an issue with shipments, quality, or services. Can always get a hold of someone to help if there is an issue and always have communication that keeps me up to date.
One of the best companies I've worked with in my 25 year career.  Knowledgeable and fast!
Great price.  I appreciated receiving an email notification of product promotions, making the item affordable to purchase.

Review.Titre: A simple thing like being able to speak…
Review.Contenu: A simple thing like being able to speak to live personnel. They were knowledgeable and reassuring when addressing my questions and concerns about a first-time order I had placed online - this was a very positive experience.

Review.Titre: Linda Queen is the gold standard.
Review.Contenu: Linda Queen is what has made every experience I have with Connection great. She offers world-class support to her clients. Linda is responsive, thorough, and so very helpful.

Samsung s6 lite 64 GB, opted for slow very cheap shipping which was available, a plus, 5 days West to East coast ground, for savings. About 2 business days for shipping out, email had device serial number included, tracking. Very good buy, used the savings on shipping for a case.

Review.Titre: Connection Sets and is Constantly Raising the Bar
Review.Contenu: As always, great website (looks good, intuitive, responsive), easy to find what I'm looking for and doesn't take long to get thru checkout and complete an order.  Email updates are nice to have, including tracking numbers that actually work!

Review.Titre: Always easy to find what I need!
Review.Contenu: Always easy to find what I need or repeat a previous order. The web site tools are very helpful. The email notifications allow me to track the progress of my orders and I don't have to make extra effort to plan my inbound resources. Paul does a great job for me!
Connection is a great partner for our hardware and software needs. Our Sales Manager Dennis K. is always quick to respond!

Review.Titre: Easy to order and delivery times are…
Review.Contenu: Easy to order and delivery times are swift
as always - Curtis does an amazing job helping us with our needs
Free shipping and quick delivery. The registration process was easy and quick too.
Always gets the quotes back to me in a timely matter. Always able to answer questions when they arise... Great Customer Service!

Connection was been personable, communicative and straight out fast when it comes to sourcing Apple products. We appreciate their flexibility and consistency for now years in our partnership. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Got a printer cable at unbeatable price…
Review.Contenu: Got a printer cable at unbeatable price + free USPS ground shipping, delivered quickly, top service !

Connection was the ONLY place that had the item I wanted in stock, and didn't charge an obscene amount for shipping.  Shipping was free, which is particularly amazing based on how great the shipping was!  The item, in its own strapped thick box, was packed inside of a comically large double-wall corrugated shipping box with a huge amount of air bags to ensure that the item arrived in perfect condition!  Shipping was also VERY fast!The entire experience was great.  I called them because their web site read, "Limited quantities.  Call for next available shipment".  I called the next day, and reached an actual person right away.  She confirmed that four were in stock, and could ship immediately.  Service was superb!I'm a customer for life based on this excellent experience!
Quick shipping, convenient online portal, adaptable payment methods, active support representitives, isngle points of contact. All great as far as i'm concerned

Review.Titre: We have been customers for many years…
Review.Contenu: We have been customers for many years and in the past the customer service has been inconsistent and often times bad. Recently that isn't the case at all! Carter and Scott are incredibly helpful and respond in a very timely matter! Thanks for all you do!
Connection.com has a long history in the PC world. They have great service and great people. They have been our "partners" for years and will continue to be with us in the future.
I love working with connection. they are very responsive, helpful, and great on pricing.

Review.Titre: I obtained exactly what I wanted
Review.Contenu: I obtained exactly what I wanted. The web site was well done and advised me how to lubricate my shredder. Looking forward to lubricate my shredder.

Excellent experience. Everything was better than expected. Their customer service is outstanding, very prompt, polite, professional and most important US based. I received an item that was hard to find new in the box and in excellent condition like promised. The packaging was done with great care, the shipping was very fast and the tracking information provided in their website was excellent. I highly recommend the company and will buy from them with confidence anytime. Narvin Kopliku, MD

Review.Titre: Great folks to do business with.
Review.Contenu: Always quick response on orders and great customer service. Great availability of products and quick shipping turn around.

Review.Titre: Everything was easy from start to…
Review.Contenu: Everything was easy from start to finish. Placed my order and it was sent in multiple shipments, but within 24 hours at least 2 of them (out of 4) had already shipped and the other 2 shipped in the next consecutive days. Couldn't be happier, plus the prices was great.

I have been trying to get this model printer from other companies for over a month and it's been on back order.  When I saw it on your website at a reasonable price, I ordered it.  There were no delays and the printer arrived sooner than expected.  I am very satisfied with the service.  Thank you!

Review.Titre: I had to call in because after the…
Review.Contenu: I had to call in because after the purchase i realized it said it wasn't in stock and the operater was very helpful. This was the first time i order from your company later they called and veried the order and got things on the right track.

Review.Titre: It's always a pleasure working with Ben…
Review.Contenu: It's always a pleasure working with Ben Allen and the team at Connection. They always take care of me and do their best to ensure that we have the support we need. This is why I almost ALWAYS use Connection exclusively.
We receive immediate responses from Karen anytime we have a question.  Shipping seems immediate.  Connection has shown us how good a vendor relationship can be.  We are thrilled.

Review.Titre: The price was cheaper than other online…
Review.Contenu: The price was cheaper than other online retailers and the shipping was free. The business called to confirm the order since I was a new customer. Very friendly. I purchased an Ergotron monitor stand, very high quality and the price was beat all competition.

The helpful person I spoke to determined what accessories I needed and gave me the item numbers to add to my computer order. A suggestion for improvement is that I needed to dial 800-800-0014 instead of “888-213-0607 & the prompt new purchases” to get through to a live person.  My experience since I started purchasing computers from PC “Connection” has been very good.
Jon Logan's the best! I had a shopping list of items I needed, and Jon helped me choose the best laptop for the job, and source the different pieces so they arrived in a coordinated timeframe.
Wow, stumbled across this to order oil for my shredder, not only was it cheaper then Walmart, but free shipping to boot, and super fast arrival!!! So impressed!

Our Connection Account Manager is quick to respond with answers to our questions. The online order process is easy to navigate and in stock orders ship quickly. The Asset Management Department at Highlights for Children couldn't be happier with the service and support Connection provides!

Review.Titre: If your looking for quality you came to the right place!
Review.Contenu: After searching the internet I came across Connection and found quality IT products at great prices. One stop shop and purchased everything I needed for this project.
Needed a specialty cord ~ USB  A - A,  you had it, best price and easy order online. Loved doing business with your company. Added to my ( Rolodex) I mean contact list.

Review.Titre: Got a hard drive for half the price!
